pkgmetadata.longdescription: Bayesian Structure Learning in Graphical Models using Birth-Death MCMC // Statistical tools for Bayesian structure learning in undirected graphical models for continuous, ordinal/discrete/count, and mixed data. The package is implemented the recent improvements in the Bayesian graphical models' literature, including Mohammadi and Wit (2015) doi:10.1214/14-BA889, Mohammadi et al. (2021) doi:10.1080/01621459.2021.1996377, and Dobra and Mohammadi (2018) doi:10.1214/18-AOAS1164.
